roleset.name: make an appearance for the first time
roleset.note: DEBUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'debut' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from debut.01-v predicate notes)
DEBUT-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to debut.01-v. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie. (from debut.01-n)

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: ``La Familia de Hoy,'' or ``Today's Family,'' will debut this spring and will combine a national bimonthly magazine and TV programming.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Nicky and Allison also have cerebral palsy , and their visit to Nickelodeon coincides with the network 's debut of `` Pelswick , '' an animated series about a 13 - year - old boy in a wheelchair .
example.arg: of `` Pelswick , '' an animated series about a 13 - year - old boy in a wheelchair

example.name: Arg 1 in a PP
example.text: The debut of the senior Professional Baseball Association
example.arg: of the senior Professional Baseball Association
